src_original: na ca tadvinaśyati sthāvaratvāt,  vināśaśca tasya virodhina balena kriyata iti?
na hyetatsambhavati jīvati devadatto maraṇaṃ cāsya bhavatīti /  atha vinaśyati,  kathaṃ tarhyavinaśvaraṃ tadvastu svahetorjātam?  na hi mriyate cāmaraṇadharmā ceti yujyate vaktum /
tasmādanaśvaratve kadācidapi naśāyogāt,  dṛṣṭatvācca nāśasya,  naśvarameva tadvastu svahetorupajāta ityaṅgīkurmaḥ /
